DOC.criteria: 18 year age old . Intent undergo contour cheek 1.5 2 ml Restylane SubQ per cheek . Sufficient symmetry face order ensure similar volume inject , similar injection technique time injection . Signed informed consent . Surgery midface include aesthetic facial surgical therapy , sinus surgery dental root surgery within past 12 month . Chronic infection head neck region . Ongoing infection mouth . Tendency edema , puffiness swell zygomatic prominence . Active skin disease , inflammation related condition , infection , psoriasis herpes zoster near area treat . Previous hypersensitivity hyaluronic acid local anesthetic . Concomitant anticoagulant therapy therapy inhibitor platelet aggregation within 10 day prior treatment , history bleeding disorder . Cancerous precancerous lesion area treat . Previous tissue augment therapy area treat nonpermanent filler , laser treatment , chemical peeling last 6 month . Permanent implant place area treat . Reduced sensibility facial region e.g . due trauma , facial pareses , previous tissue augment therapy , aesthetic facial surgical therapy , laser treatment , peel . Pregnancy breast feed . Participation clinical study within 30 day prior inclusion .
